desc: AQUAOVO is a world leader in Eco Friendly Water Dispenser and Water Filtration Systems. Launched over 10 years ago by Montreal Designer Manuel Desrochers, the AQUAOVO experience has since been providing sexy eco conscious alternatives to Bottled Water and uninspired Water Filtration devices.

layout.text:
Not to brag, but the OVOPUR is the only available water filtration device in the world to be part of a permanent Design collection in a world class Fine Arts Museum.

Just sayin...
